Job Description
Performs experimental studies in the Lab relating to specific research projects. Carries out clinical and research activities as directed.

Responsibilities Include:
  • Performs investigative research and/or development work under the guidance of an Investigator, Associate Investigator or Assistant Investigator.
  • Responsible for the collection, analysis and interpretation of research data related to specific project.
  • May submit manuscripts and abstracts for publication/presentation.
  • Performs a variety of tasks, including but not limited to, correspondence, attending meetings, database maintenance, maintaining records, charts, etc.
  • Responsible for all other activities, clinical and administrative, as appropriate.
  • Supervises research staff; provides technical direction to research staff.
  • Performs related duties, as required.
Qualifications

• Doctorate (M.D. or Ph.D.) Degree, required.
  • Minimum of three (3) years of related work experience.
  • May have authored/co-authored published articles and/or abstracts.
  • Ability to communicate effectively.
